name: Commute! [12 Second Challenge]
description:
Brief
Create a 12-second long game based on physical reflexes (physical challenge). Only use basic programming concepts (basic logic, no arrays/for loops) and your own art to build the game.

Game Features

- 12 second timed challenge

- Avoid objects trying to collide with you

- Time your movement right to get on the train

- Refine the optimal level path through replaying the game

Making the game

I decided to make a game around commuting because I live in London and commuting is the bane of my life.

I thought an interesting physical challenge would be to use simple controls to overcome slightly different stages throughout the screen, with varying patterns and difficulty. This makes it more difficult for the player to master, but yields more rewards upon successful completion.
